00006 #ifndef _FCD_PHYSICS_PARAMETER_GENERIC_H_
00007 #define _FCD_PHYSICS_PARAMETER_GENERIC_H_
00008 
00009 #ifndef __FCD_OBJECT_H_
00010 #include "FCDocument/FCDObject.h"
00011 #endif // __FCD_OBJECT_H_
00012 
00013 class FCDocument;
00014 
00015 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric : public FCDObject
00016 {
00017 private:
00018     DeclareObjectType(FCDObject);
00019 
00020 protected:
00021     bool isGenerator; // whether this effect parameter structure generates a new value or modifies an existing value (is <newparam>?)
00022     fm::string reference;
00023 
00024 public:
00025     FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric(FCDocument* document, const fm::string& ref);
00026     virtual ~FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric();
00027 
00028     bool IsGenerator() const { return isGenerator; }
00029     bool IsModifier() const { return !isGenerator; }
00030 
00031     const fm::string& GetReference() const {return reference;};
00032     void SetReference(const fm::string& ref) { reference = ref; SetDirtyFlag(); };
00033     void SetGenerator(bool val) { isGenerator = val; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00034 
00035     virtual void Overwrite(FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* target) = 0;
00036 
00037     // Clones the parameter
00038     virtual FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* Clone(FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* clone = NULL) const = 0;
00039 
00040     // Write out this ColladaFX parameter to the XML node tree
00041     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const = 0;
00042 };
00043 
00044 #endif // _FCD_PHYSICS_PARAMETER_GENERIC_H_
